backFields.label: Briefing Details
backFields.value:
Join us for the Q4 2025 Capitol Fund Impact Briefing — an exclusive quarterly update for LIFT Certificate holders.

Agenda:
• Q4 Performance Review
• Regenerative Capital Framework Progress
• Community Impact Metrics
• 2026 Strategic Priorities
• Holder Q&A Session

Doors open at 5:30 PM. Briefing begins at 6:00 PM.
Networking reception follows at 7:30 PM.

backFields.label: LIFT Holder Access
backFields.value:
This Impact Briefing is exclusive to LIFT Certificate holders in the 2025Q4 series.

Your LIFT Certificate provides:
• Priority seating
• Access to private Q&A
• Networking reception
• Early access to 2026 offerings

Please bring your LIFT Certificate pass (digital or printed QR code) for check-in.

backFields.label: Venue & Parking
backFields.value:
Bell Tower Hall
Frederick, Maryland

Walking distance from downtown Frederick. On-site parking available.

Public Transit: MARC Brunswick Line to Frederick Station (15 min walk)

Accessibility: Wheelchair accessible entrance on south side.

locations.relevantText: Welcome to Bell Tower Hall! Your Impact Briefing starts at 6:00 PM.
